name: obsidian-sentence-enhancers
description: An Obsidian plugin that adds a radial/pie menu for quick actions/action groups for better UX on mobile, and (to a lesser extent) desktop. (https://github.com/garrett-is-a-swann/obsidian-radial/tree/radial-retargeting)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Garrett Swann
